## ğŸ“ Documentation Types

### Auto-Generated Documentation
- **COMPLETION_REPORT_[FID]_[DATE].md** - Feature implementation summaries
- **QA_RESULTS_[FID]_[DATE].md** - Testing and validation reports
- **AUDIT_REPORT_[TYPE]_[DATE].md** - Quality control audit results
- **IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE_[FID]_[DATE].md** - Technical implementation docs

### Manual Documentation
- **API.md** - API endpoint documentation
- **AUTHENTICATION.md** - Authentication system docs
- **[feature].md** - Feature-specific documentation

## ğŸ¯ Guidelines

### Auto-Generated Docs (via GENERATE_DOCUMENTATION())
âœ… Created automatically on feature completion  
âœ… Proper naming: [TYPE]_[FID]_[YYYYMMDD].md  
âœ… Auto-linked from dev/completed.md  
âœ… Professional formatting with headers  
ğŸš« Never created in root or /dev folders

### Manual Documentation
âœ… Create as needed for reference  
âœ… Keep up-to-date with code changes  
âœ… Link from relevant sections  
âœ… Use clear, structured formatting

## ğŸ“Š Organization

**By Feature:** Group docs by feature/FID  
**By Type:** Separate completion reports, guides, API docs  
**By Date:** Use YYYYMMDD format for easy sorting
